overview: "A Celebration of Culture" A look into the ever-evolving food culture of New Haven Connecticut. A city that at one point was considered one of the most dangerous in America, has focused its efforts into becoming a diverse culinary mecca. Narrated by New Haven's award-winning chefs and diverse locals, enjoy a deeper look into a city that's national recognition often gets left on the back burner. Small city, big flavor.
title: Food Haven
